ai-patthana7.15:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana7.15:1.1_0: When there is no wrong thought ...
ai-patthana7.15:1.1_1: Intentionally for the previous undetermined teaching ...
ai-patthana7.15:1.1_2: Thoughts don’t give rise to the undetermined teaching.
ai-patthana7.15:2.1_0: Transmigrating as a result of four bases ...
